definition[0]: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another planet
definition[1]: the extreme and worrying seriousness of a situation
example[1]: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
example[2]: The penalties should be proportionate to the gravity of the offence.
definition[2]: an extremely serious way of behaving or speaking
example[3]: The Consul spoke slowly and with great gravity.
